description: A very simple grilled cheese sandwich recipe, with the creamy tanginess of garlic mayo.
name: Batch Loaf Grilled Cheese Sandwich with Garlic Mayo Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the garlic mayonnaise on the slices of bread evenly on one side. Place the cheddar cheese slices on each of the pieces of bread.
Grill the bread, cheese side up for 1 minute and then remove from the grill. Now double the bread up by placing one on the other with the cheese inside.
Grill again for 2 minutes on each side before serving with a choice of condiments.
